column4: Hello.  I'm trying to find some kind of documentation on how to set up a heavily stripped down Ubuntu box, and google isn't helping...any pointers?
I want to remove all the services and such that aren't needed for the purpoise of the box, which is video playback.
i saw a forum/wiki thread about that just the otehr day. on the ubuntu site.
one normally uses 'deboostrap' to install ubuntu onto a hard drive from  within a different os.
